title: Spacious Whitehaven Apartment - 2 Bedroom
posting_body: Newly remodeled 2 bedroom 1 bath spacious downstairs unit in our desirable Graceland Square Courtyard community.
The available unit is adjacent to our play structure and has easy parking and entrance on Faronia Road.
The apartment complex enjoys an excellent location nearby hospital, schools and shopping.
Laundry facility and playground facility for residents to use.
Washer/dryer hookup, new paint, carpet, central heat and parking.
Apply in person on M-W-F mornings between 8:30 and 12:00.
Application fee is $25/pp over the age of 18.
We do credit and background screening onsite.
The deposit for this apartment is $550.
